summary: The diff implements most requirements including the personalized message with fade animation, hidden compliments, hero image removal, theme switcher fix, tasks tab with gamification, exercise category tabs, and additional settings. However, several backend features related to task automation and monthly tracking are incomplete or missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement daily and monthly task completion tracking that stores user progress over time
missing_requirements.reason: Backend implements DailyRecord type and taskData map, but monthly aggregation and big reward eligibility tracking for consistent monthly completion is not implemented. The AC specifies at month's end users with consistent completion are identified for big reward eligibility which is absent.

missing_requirements.requirement: Automatically refresh daily tasks at midnight each day with a new set of challenges
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of automatic midnight reset mechanism in backend. The getDailyTasks function checks date but does not implement automatic reset logic or task rotation. No timer or scheduler code exists for midnight refresh.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module with data migration logic for canister upgrades
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration.mo creates data structures for canister upgrade handling with OldActor and NewActor types and migration.run function, but no such feature was requested in the BuildRequest. This is infrastructure code not mentioned in requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt is a documentation file describing frontend components, but creating documentation files was not part of any requirement. This appears to be a development artifact.
